charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1101_0100:
Serena was participating in a photo shoot aboard
a hot-air balloon.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1101_0200:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] tagged along and
was watching the hot-air balloon from the ground.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_0400: Serena is so cute... She looks just like a princess!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_0500:
Greninja looks cool, too! He’s like a
dependable knight!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_0700:
Team Break took my partner Pokémon! Somebody
get them!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1000: Wh-who are you? Did you fall from the sky?!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1100: Enough talk! Get ready to lose!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1200:
Phew... Case closed. We managed to stop
Team Break.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1300:
Although there was some trouble toward the
end, I’m glad the photo shoot ended well.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1800:
During the shoot, I could hear people saying that—
that I looked like a princess and Greninja looked
like a knight—and it made me so happy!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_1900:
I love cute princesses—and I admire cool knights
just as much!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2000:
I understand why Greninja seems so much like
a knight.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2100:
He’s been battling using different strategies since
he was a Froakie.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2200:
His features are very similar to a ninja’s—just like
Koga and Janine.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2300: And he protects me, just like a knight would.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2400:
But I don’t want to be a princess who’s just
protected by others.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2500: I want to have superintense Pokémon battles!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2600: And I also want to be as cute as I can be...
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_2700:
So basically, my goal is to be a battling knight
AND a supercute princess!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_0301_2800: I think you can be both.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_0401_2900:
Thanks! Hearing that from you gives
me confidence!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_0402_3100: Thanks! Keep training with me, OK?
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3200:
I think I can reach my goal as long as I’m
with Greninja.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3300:
Earlier, Greninja carried me and jumped out of the
hot-air balloon, without me asking.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3400: Thanks to that, we were able to stop Team Break.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3500:
We’ve been together a long time since our days
in Kalos, and we make a perfect combination.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3600:
We overcame many things together—and shared
many fun times...
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3700: We also had fights too, you know.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3800: That’s why we understand each other.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_3900:
We won’t be defeated by anyone who only puts
in a half-hearted effort.
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_4000:
Do you plan to challenge us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_4100: If so, we’ll battle you with all of our strength!
charaepi_ch0130_90_serena/2301_1201_4200:
We’ll show you our teamwork—and Greninja’s
sharp moves...
